titles.title: To amend the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to inquire that the motor vehicle bumper standard established by the Secretary of Transportation shall be restored to that in effect January 1, 1982.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E745)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 4/21/1994--Introduced. Amends the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to direct the Secretary of Transportation to amend a specified bumper standard to ensure that it is identical to the one in effect on January 1, 1982.
